text: Kate Middleton Had Pickles Delivered To Kensington Palace To Satisfy Pregnancy Craving? Did Kate Middleton have a jar of pickles delivered to Kensington Palace to satisfy her pregnancy craving? That ’ s the claim in one of this week ’ s new tabloids, which contends that the Duchess of Cambridge had a security guard ’ s wife make the special delivery. Gossip Cop can correct this bogus report. We ’ re told it ’ s “ false. ” “ Craving Kate ’ s Decree : ‘ My Kingdom For A Pickle! ’ ” blares a headline in the latest issue of Star. In the accompanying story, the publication quotes a so - called “ palace insider ” as saying, “ Will was thrilled when Kate said she was hungry and asked
